title: Rift herald+river scuttle
body: What if there was a rift scuttle. A giant scuttle that walks up and down the mid lane. Whenever you kill it you restore heaps of health and mana. When killed it makes a circle in the middle of mid lane that gives the killing team heaps of movement speed.

replies.body: Maybe on a game mode but not summoners rift
Yeah true. But just imagine it in sr
